N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 170.6 - Flexible payments

State Regulations

In any school year in which the statewide total of the
flexible payments to be paid in the months of December through March, pursuant
to subdivision (1) of section
3609
of the

Education Law, exceeds the amount appropriated for such purpose, such flexible
payments shall be reduced as follows: (a) No later than December 1st of each year, the commissioner will calculate the statewide total of such payments based upon
data available as of the date of the commissioner's calculation. (b) The appropriation for general support for
public schools, excluding appropriations for special programs, which remains
available after making prescribed payments, pursuant to paragraph a of
subdivision (1) of section
3609
of the

Education Law, will be divided by such statewide total of flexible payments, and the result will be expressed as a decimal carried to five places without
rounding. (c) If such decimal is
equal to or greater than one, no reduction of appropriations shall be made. If
such decimal is less than one, each school district's allocations to be made in
the months of December through March shall be reduced to the amount calculated
by multiplying by such decimal the amount it would be entitled to receive if no
reductions were necessary. Notes
